scripts.start:render: npx prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250926000406_add_user_roles && npx prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250926001910_apply_user_roles && npx prisma migrate deploy && node src/index.js
scripts.dev:open: concurrently -n API,BROWSER -c blue,green "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000/api/health && powershell -NoProfile -Command Start-Process 'http://localhost:3000/api/health'"
